Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Task class contains the information about each individual task including the taskName, taskDescription, if the task is recurring, and if the task is active. The Task additionally contains an ISwapList of AbstractTaskLists called taskLists. The Task class implements the Cloneable interface.
    Author:
    Meles Meles, Helen Solomon

    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task​(java.lang.String taskName,
            java.lang.String taskDescription,
            boolean recurring,
            boolean active)
        Constructs the Task with the given parameters. The taskLists field is constructed to an empty SwapList of AbstractTaskLists.
        Parameters:
        taskName - name of the task
        taskDescription - description of task
        recurring - recurring state of task
        active - active state of class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - with the message "Incomplete task information." if either taskName or TaskDiscription are null or empty.

      • addTaskList

        public void addTaskList​(AbstractTaskList list)
        Adds AbstractTaskLists to the classes taskLists.
        Parameters:
        list - AbstractTaskList to be added to taskLists
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - with the message "Incomplete task information.", if the list is null.

      • completeTask

        public void completeTask()
        A method that marks Tasks complete. If the task to be completed is recurring then the task is cloned and added to every taskLists elements. Also the Tasks are competed by calling the of the tasks from the method AbstractTaskList.completeTask().
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if clone cannot be created.

      • clone

        public Task clone()
           throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Returns a copy of the Task.
        Returns:
        cloned object
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - with the message "Cannot clone." if there are no AbstractTaskLists registered with the Task.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the Task for printing to a file.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string of the classes representation.
